trivia_items.text: Gladiia is the first 6★ welfare Operator.
Her name is a reference to the species name of the swordfish (Xiphias gladius), which she has the traits of.
sub_items: Similar to Thorns, Gladiia is one of the few Operators whose animals they are based on are notably absent in their Elite 2 artworks, though her hat is styled after swordfish's bills and fins, and her outfit's color scheme is similar to that of swordfish.
Her name/title by the Seaborn, Gla-dia, means "dejected spirit" in Sanskrit.

trivia_items.text: Along with Sora, Pudding, and Ethan, Gladiia is the only Operator who is not deployed into the map by being airdropped – she instead appears to gracefully slide into position.
Along with Akafuyu and Skadi the Corrupting Heart, Gladiia's skills have the longest names of all Operator skills.
Gladiia's outfit somewhat resembles that of Lady Maria in Bloodborne.
The whirlpool/maelstrom created by Gladiia's third skill is often compared with a washing machine or a flushing toilet, thus turning into a joke within the community.
